abstract: Hughie Elbert Stover, former head of security at the Upper Big Branch mine, is convicted of impeding the investigation into 2010 mine explosion that killed 29 men; Stover is first person criminally prosecuted in what was worst American coal mining disaster in decades.
snippet: The former head of security at the Upper Big Branch mine was convicted Wednesday of impeding the investigation into a 2010 explosion that killed 29 men there.
lead_paragraph: The former head of security at the Upper Big Branch mine was convicted Wednesday of impeding the investigation into a 2010 explosion that killed 29 men there.

headline.main: West Virginia: Security Chief Guilty in Mine Inquiry
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Security Chief Guilty in Mine Inquiry
